name: Spring Garden Defense
description:
Plant some flowers in your Spring time garden, but make sure to plant some defense plants to help keep your flowers safe from bugs!

Controls / Instructions:

  • WASD to move
  • Collect seeds as they pop up and as they drop from defeated bugs.
  • Click on the buttons to place plants in your garden.

Your plants are constantly growing, so they get stronger, have more health, do more damage, or generate more points as they grow! But be wary, because the bugs that are attacking your garden are also constantly growing stronger and faster!
